translation.en: -[sighs] -[operator] Good morning, Miss Belmont. This is your wake-up call.
translation.ko: 좋은 아침입니다, 벨몬트 양 모닝콜 서비스입니다

translation.en: [operator] Would you like me to send up your--
♪ Everybody's waitin' For the man with the bag ♪ ♪ 'Cause Christmas is comin' again ♪
Tell your father you don't want the job.
He flew me all the way up here in his private jet for Christmas.
I don't want to hurt his feelings. [sighs]

translation.ko: 안녕하세요, 벨몬트 양 고객 서비스팀의 테리 카버입니다

translation.en: I'm Terry Carver from Guest Services. Your father has asked me
translation.ko: 안녕하세요, 벨몬트 양 고객 서비스팀의 테리 카버입니다 아버님이 부탁하셔서 제가 임시 수행 비서를 할 거예요

translation.en: to work as your personal assistant while you're here.
translation.ko: 아버님이 부탁하셔서 제가 임시 수행 비서를 할 거예요

translation.en: And this is your Glam Squad.
It's just that I don't want to be in the hotel business.
Have you tried telling him that?
As far as he's concerned, this is the perfect career for me.
[man] I'm just trying to imagine what you'd have to wear.
translation.ko: 일할 때 의상을 상상하려고 노력 중인데

translation.en: Not a name tag, I hope.
translation.ko: 설마 사원증까지 달고 다니는 건 아니겠지?

translation.en: -What exactly is the position? -Vice President of Atmosphere.
It's not even a real job. I think he just made it up to give me something to do.
translation.ko: 제대로 된 직책도 아니야 나 그만 놀라고 만들어 낸 거지

translation.en: [groans] And, you know, it's hard enough for me as it is.
translation.ko: 안 그래도 힘든데 정말 짜증 나

translation.en: When people look at me, all they see is the spoiled daughter
translation.ko: 다들 나만 보면 호텔계 거물 보러가드 벨몬트의

translation.en: of Beauregard Belmont, the hotel magnate. And I'm not spoiled!
translation.ko: 철없는 딸로 생각하잖아 내가 얼마나 철이 있는데!
원피스와 슬랙스 중 어떤 거로 할까요?

translation.en: I don't know. Is that pleather?
Oh, Tad, help me! I need to make my own mark in the world.
translation.ko: 타드, 도와줘! 나도 명성 좀 쌓고 싶다고

translation.en: [Tad] Okay, okay. How are your socials doing?
Not good. I told you my accounts were hacked by that girl, remember?
translation.ko: 별로야, 기억하지? 그 여자가 계정 해킹했다니까

translation.en: Ugh! Right. Lucky you're dating one of Hype Magazine's
translation.ko: 그랬지, 넌 운도 좋다 하이프 잡지 최고의

translation.en: [sighs] So you remind me every day.
why don't we hit the slopes and snap a few ussies? Hmm?
translation.ko: 슬로프 위에서 다 같이 사진 좀 찍을까?

translation.en: I thought you wanted to keep our relationship private.
[Tad] Well, maybe it's time we let the world in on it.
translation.ko: 이제 세상에 알릴 때도 된 거 같아

translation.en: And it will prove to your father you could have a career as an influencer too.
translation.ko: 너도 인플루언서가 될 수 있단 걸 아빠한테 보여주는 거지

translation.en: Yeah, I just want people to remember me for more than my last name.
translation.ko: 난 사람들한테 아빠 딸로만 기억되고 싶지 않아

translation.en: -You leave it to your Tad. -[phone chimes]
Time for a selfie in a limo. See you soon.
translation.ko: 리무진 셀카를 올릴 타이밍이군 이따 봐

translation.en: Something like that. Let's go with the Valenyagi.
translation.ko: 그런 거 같네요 발렌야기 의상으로 하죠

translation.en: Hi. Hey. Uh, I'm Jake Russell. I own the--
Yeah, my secretary mentioned you called.
I just wanted a minute of your time if I could.
But you're gonna have to beat me to the bottom of the run.
translation.ko: 슬로프 아래까지 나보다 더 빨리 내려가면요

translation.en: Yeah, I thought I had you there for a minute, but you got me in the end.
translation.ko: 제가 이긴 줄 알았는데 마지막에 당했네요

translation.en: Let's go. You can talk while we walk.
Wow, this place looks like something out of SpaceX.
Well, we try to stay ahead of the curve.
Wow. Well, you have an incredible place here, sir.
It's, uh, truly a world-class skiing destination.
translation.ko: 왜 이곳이 세계적인 스키 리조트인지 알겠어요

translation.en: But, you know, not everybody can afford world-class.
translation.ko: 하지만 모두가 세계적인 리조트를 이용할 수는 없잖아요

translation.en: Studies show that 70% of beginners learn to ski at these smaller resorts.
Exactly. And then as they become more accomplished and better skiers,
then they move up to the mega-resorts, like this one.
translation.ko: 그때 이런 대규모 리조트에서 스키를 타면 되니까요

translation.en: And you think that I should invest in your lodge
in order to make sure that this keeps happening, correct?
But I have the numbers here for a cost-effective upgrade,
translation.ko: 가성비 높은 업그레이드 비용도 다 적어 왔어요

translation.en: a high-speed lift, you know, building on a spa with a hot tub, sauna--
translation.ko: 고속 리프트 온탕과 사우나가 있는 스파…

translation.en: Mr. Russell, I wish I could help you, but I have my own investors to answer to.
translation.ko: 러셀 씨, 도와주고 싶지만 나도 투자자들에게 묶여 있어서요

translation.en: -I'm sure you understand. Thank you, dear. -Well--
Here you go. On the house.
-And anything else he may need today. -Of course.
translation.ko: - 이분이 달라는 건 다 줘요 - 네

translation.en: If you'll excuse me, I gotta run.
Oh, and, uh, pretty classy out there letting me win.
translation.ko: 아까 보니 매너가 있더군요 일부러 져주다니

translation.en: [man] This is security. Alert the staff. Miss Belmont is on the move.
translation.ko: 보안팀이 직원들에게 알립니다 벨몬트 양이 출발합니다

translation.en: -No, he did not go for it. -[man] Ah, bummer.
-Well, yeah. It was a long shot anyways. -[man] Sorry, man.
-Yeah. See you back at the lodge. -[man] Okay. See you soon.
translation.ko: - 리조트에서 봐 - 그래, 좀 이따 봐

translation.en: Okay. Well, I'm in the lobby. I don't see you.
and let's be honest, I'm pretty hard to miss.
translation.ko: 나는 어디를 가도 확 튀는 스타일인데, 안 보여?

translation.en: Look, I'm by a tapestry that goes really well with my jacket.
translation.ko: 지금 태피스트리 옆이야 내 재킷이랑 깔맞춤 딱이네

translation.en: Now I'm in the lounge by the fireplace.
I am so sorry. I didn't see you there.
Oh, I'd happily pay for your dry cleaning, or get some club soda…
-He ran right into me. -It was an accident!
You know, I came around the corner, she was coming around,
-and we just, wham, a chocolate thing. -Is everything all right?
-I'm a little flustered, but thank you. -Tad!
Oh, but this local yokel just body slammed my girlfriend
translation.ko: 이 무식한 남자가 내 여자친구를 쳤어요

translation.en: and ruined her haute couture onesie.
-Again, I'm so sorry. It was an accident. -Look, mate. Just go, all right? Just go.
translation.ko: - 다시 사과할게요, 사고였어요 - 이봐, 그냥 가, 가라고

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah. Easy with the finger.
Would mademoiselle care for the artisanal, house-smoked bacon on her wedge salad?
translation.ko: 마드모아젤, 웨지 샐러드에 직접 훈제한 베이컨도 추가할까요?

translation.en: No, thank you. I don't do bacon.
So, Ted, how is this online internet business thing of yours going?
translation.ko: 테드, 온라인 사업인지 뭔지는 어떻게 돼 가고 있어?

translation.en: It's Tad, Daddy. And it's not a business thing.
Tad's an influencer. Millions of people follow him.
So how long have you two been seeing each other now?
I think it's time you call him Beauregard.
translation.ko: 친근하게 이름을 부를 때도 되지 않았나?

translation.en: You know how it is. One day…
translation.ko: 남녀 만남이 다 그렇잖아요 어느 날 갑자기

translation.en: In the coffee shop of life.
-[man 2] Hi, Jake. -Hi, how's it going? Hey, buddy.
Trying to get this one going, but it's not happening.
Okay. Yeah, just leave it in the shed, and I'll get to it later.
Dad! The Christmas Wish Tree, remember? Mom took us every year.
translation.ko: 크리스마스 소원 트리 기억해요? 엄마랑 매년 갔잖아요

translation.en: Jake! Why don't you come with us?
Well, as fun as that sounds,
I have guests that want a sleigh ride, so I'll take a snow check this time.
translation.ko: 썰매 예약 손님이 있어서요 나중에 같이 가요

translation.en: But would you do me a favor? Would you put in a good word with Santa for me?
translation.ko: 대신 산타 할아버지한테 아빠 얘기 좀 해줄래?

translation.en: I need all the help I can get.
I take it things didn't go well?
Belmont was literally the last resort. If the rest of the season's this way, I don't think--
translation.ko: 더는 달리 방법도 없어요 이번 시즌도 계속 이러면…

translation.en: We just need a little patience.
What we need is a miracle.
Haven't you heard, Dad? Christmas is a time for miracles.
All right. Yeah. Bring me back something good.
translation.ko: 좋은 일 좀 생기게 소원 잘 빌고 와

translation.en: Yeah. I'm ready to leave for the airport. Could you have my car brought around?
translation.ko: 공항 갈 준비 끝났으니 차 좀 가져다주겠나?

translation.en: -[staff] Yes, Mr. Belmont. -Oh, good. You're still here.
translation.ko: 네, 벨몬트 씨 - 다행이다, 아직 안 가셨네요 - 왔어?

translation.en: -Oh, hi! -I didn't wanna miss you before you left.
translation.ko: - 다행이다, 아직 안 가셨네요 - 왔어? 가시기 전에 꼭 보고 싶었거든요

translation.en: Well, I'll be back by the weekend.
We will get you set up in your new office.
I was thinking the one next to mine if that's okay?
I just don't wanna disappoint you. [laughs] I don't think you could do that, honey.
translation.ko: - 실망시키고 싶지 않아서요 - 너한테 실망할 리가 없잖아

translation.en: Oh, I haven't seen this in a while.
Your mother gave me that in Gstaad.
translation.ko: 네 엄마가 크슈타트에서 선물해 준 거야

translation.en: [Beauregard] She said that the little girl reminded her of you.
translation.ko: 그 소녀를 보면 네 생각이 난다고 했지

translation.en: You were only five when she…
translation.ko: 그 일이 있었을 때 넌 고작 5살이었으니까

translation.en: I remember her perfume and her laugh.
How she used to brush my hair.
[sighs] This hotel reminds me so much of her.
translation.ko: 이 호텔에도 엄마에 대한 추억이 많이 남아 있어요

translation.en: I promised your mother I'd take care of you.
I mean, you've given me everything I've ever wanted.
translation.ko: 제가 원하는 건 뭐든 다 주셨잖아요

translation.en: Well, honey, I'll be back by Christmas Eve.
I'll be in very good hands.
translation.ko: 아주 믿을 만한 사람과 함께 있을 테니까요

translation.en: Now, I don't want to be disturbed when I'm with Tad.
translation.ko: 타드랑 있을 때는 절대 방해하지 마요

translation.en: If I need anything, I'll text you.
Of course. When would you like dinner sent up to your suite?
translation.ko: 네, 그럼 저녁 식사는 언제 보내 드릴까요?
테리, 방해하지 말라는 말 못 들었어요?

translation.en: I thought we were doing the photo shoot here.
Yeah, I've reserved a private gondola.
[snorts] Gondolas are for losers. Hop in.
[sighs] You know, Daddy would have loved if we did the shoot here.
translation.ko: 여기서 사진 촬영했으면 아빠도 좋아하셨을 거야

translation.en: Just you wait, angel cakes. -Just you wait. -[car rumbles]
All right, lovebirds. I got hot cocoa and fresh gingerbread cookies.
translation.ko: 사랑꾼 손님들을 위해 코코아와 쿠키도 가져왔어요

translation.en: My friend, this fine piece of craftsmanship
translation.ko: 얼마나 튼튼하게 만들었는지 노스 스타 리조트에서

translation.en: has served the North Star for generations.
translation.ko: 벌써 몇 대 째 운영 중인 썰매예요

translation.en: I follow one of the top off-trail skiers in the country,
translation.ko: 내가 국내 최고의 오프 트레일 스키 선수를 팔로우 중인데

translation.en: and he geotagged this secluded spot.
translation.ko: 그 사람이 이 외진 곳을 태그했더라고

translation.en: You do know I don't actually ski, don't you?
translation.ko: 나 스키 못 타는 거 알지?

translation.en: No one needs to know that!
It's all smoke and mirrors, baby. [chuckles]
Do you know how to unhook the snowmobile, by any chance?
Do I look like I know how to unhook a snowmobile?
Tad, it's not voice-activated, for God's sake!
Tad! I'm getting beaten back here!
translation.ko: 타드, 나 얻어맞고 있는 거 알아?

translation.en: No signal, okay. Guess we just have to wing it.
You don't know how to get back to the car, do you? Yes, I do.

translation.ko: "경고! 위험 지역 진입 말고 돌아가시오" 타드!

translation.en: Hot roasted chestnuts, folks, right here. Okay. [laughing]
And remember, you only get one wish, so make it count.
translation.ko: 소원은 딱 하나밖에 못 비니까 신중하게 결정해

translation.en: That's good, but could you try to look a little more athletic?
translation.ko: 나쁘지는 않은데 좀 더 스포티하게 해 봐

translation.en: But, Tad, I wanna look… I wanna look sporty, but not like I'm sweating.
translation.ko: 나도 그러고 싶지만 땀 한 방울도 안 나는데?

translation.en: Well, I can't quite put my finger on it,
Sierra Belmont, the last almost-a-year with you
translation.ko: 시에라 벨몬트 근 1년 동안 너와 함께하면서

translation.en: And I want you to know that whatever the future brings,
I want it to bring us together.
[Tad] Let's make it official, shall we?
Our first social media post as an engaged couple!
You have to keep it a secret, or it won't come true.
-You guys have a Merry Christmas. -[woman] Thank you.
Um… Uh… I got my wish.
When your mommy and daddy had you.
translation.ko: 엄마랑 아빠가 너를 낳았을 때 말이야

translation.en: Okay. Let's put it up in that branch.
Take me back to the hotel.
-Oh, it better not be a dead body. -Stop it. You're freaking me out.
translation.ko: - 시체는 아니겠지? - 그만해, 불안하게 왜 그래

translation.en: Hey, miss, can you hear me?
Hey, base camp, this is Jake. I'm on the far side of Hoosier.
translation.ko: 베이스, 여기는 제이크 지금 후지어 외곽인데

translation.en: We have a Code 3. Repeat, Code 3. I need Ski Patrol immediately.
translation.ko: 코드 3가 발생했다 즉시 스키 안전팀을 보내도록

translation.en: Physically, she's all right. Minor concussion.
translation.ko: 신체 상태는 괜찮아요 경미한 뇌진탕이 있지만

translation.en: But that's not the real problem.
She says she doesn't remember anything prior to the accident.
Well, at least she's awake. That's a good thing, right?
translation.ko: 그래도 의식은 있으니 다행인 거 맞죠?

translation.en: Well, that depends upon your point of view.

translation.ko: - 환자분, 가만히 계세요 - 그만! 손대지 마요!

translation.en: No, don't touch me! Would you get your hands off of me?
translation.ko: - 환자분, 가만히 계세요 - 그만! 손대지 마요! 손대지 말라고요!

translation.en: Look, I told you I'm perfectly fine, okay?
-[exhales] -[doctor] It's okay. We'll try later. -Thank you, Gene. We'll take it from here. -[Gene sighs]
translation.ko: 괜찮아요, 나중에 다시 해 보죠 고마워요, 내가 알아서 할게요

translation.en: Finally, at last, someone with authority.
Sheriff, could you please tell her to let me out of here?
translation.ko: 보안관님, 이 여자한테 저 좀 보내주라고 해 주실래요?

translation.en: Well, miss, we'd love to be able to do that,
but first we need to figure out who you are.
What do you mean who I am?
Well, we checked your clothing for any identification,
translation.ko: 신원 확인을 위해 소지품을 다 확인했는데

translation.en: Oh! I mean, I did find this.
I'm afraid the ER team had to cut you out of those.
translation.ko: 응급 상황이라 옷을 벗기는 과정에서 잘랐대요

translation.en: Hey, uh, what about fingerprints? We took those when we brought her in.
They're not registered in our database, which means she's never been arrested
translation.ko: 데이터베이스에 없더라고요 체포 전력이 없는 거 같아요

translation.en: So what are we supposed to do with her?
Well, I could put her picture up on our missing person website.
But it is the holidays, you know.
Until someone comes looking for her or until she remembers something,
translation.ko: 누가 찾으러 오거나 기억이 돌아오지 않는 한

translation.en: there's not much I can do.
translation.ko: 할 수 있는 게 별로 없어요

translation.en: Excuse me, she is right here in the room,
translation.ko: 저기요, 지금 사람 앞에 두고 뭐라는 거예요?

translation.en: and she is tired of being treated like a prisoner
translation.ko: 그리고 나 죄수 취급 좀 그만해요

translation.en: just because you all can't do your job, so…
Take it easy. Take it easy.
-[groans] -[sheriff] Look, miss. I wish there was more that I could do,
but we have procedures to follow when we're dealing with a Jane Doe.
translation.ko: 신원 미상 인물을 처리하는 절차를 따를 수밖에 없어요

translation.en: I am not a Jane Doe!
Well, I don't know what else to call you.
You've got no identity, no money, and no place to go.
I have a place. I mean, the lodge.
translation.ko: 갈 곳은 제가 제공하죠 리조트가 있거든요

translation.en: I mean, we have some cancellations. She could stay with us.
translation.ko: 예약을 취소한 손님들이 있으니 빈 방에서 지내세요

translation.en: This is Jake Russell. He's the one who found you.
Does he look familiar to you at all?
No, he is definitely a stranger.
And I'm not about to follow him to some murder cabin in the woods.
translation.ko: 그리고 내가 미쳤다고 숲속 살인마의 집에 따라가요?

translation.en: Jake owns the North Star Lodge.
[scoffs] Okay. Does it have room service?
You know, it's actually more of, like, a bed-and-breakfast type place.
On second thought, I think she's probably better off here.
translation.ko: 얘기를 듣고 나니 병원이 차라리 낫겠네요

translation.en: Actually, you know, reestablishing a normal routine of activities
It's up to you. Now, you can stay here,
or you can take old Jake up on his offer.
I've just survived a death-defying fall,
and I'm currently stranded in a remote glacial forest.
translation.ko: 어딘지도 모를 얼음 숲에 혼자 뚝 떨어졌어요

translation.en: This recording will be a testament
translation.ko: 생명이 살아 숨 쉴 수 없는 곳에서

translation.en: to my brave fight for life against all odds.
translation.ko: 제가 얼마나 용감하게 분투했는지 이 영상을 통해 알 수 있을 거예요

translation.en: But should anyone find my body…
All righty. Went through the lost and found.
Not sure if these will fit, but they're better than scrubs.
Guess they'll have to do for now.
But, you know, sometimes guests leave things here by accident, so…
translation.ko: 가끔 손님들이 실수로 물건을 두고 가거든요

translation.en: Not sure this was left here by accident.
Here are some fresh towels, and there are clean sheets on the bed.
translation.ko: 깨끗한 수건이에요 침대에 깨끗한 시트도 뒀어요

translation.en: Look, I appreciate everything you guys are doing,
but I'm not gonna be here for that long. This is just temporary.
Well, until then, you're stuck with us.
Hi. Uh… There was a wild, hairy beast out there!
I think you're okay. They're gone.
translation.ko: 도망간 거 같네요 걱정 안 해도 되겠어요

translation.en: You know, we are out in the wilderness, so you're bound to have a few visitors from time to time.
translation.ko: 워낙 외진 곳에 있다 보니까 동물들이 찾아올 때가 있어요

translation.en: Right. Well, they can stay out there.
I thought I'd never see another human being again.
translation.ko: 다신 다른 사람을 못 보는 줄 알았어요

translation.en: I don't suppose you have a charger here for the model 15, do you?
Uh, no. Don't like cell phones.
[laughs] After my nightmarish ordeal, that would be the nectar of the gods.
translation.ko: 하도 험한 일을 겪어서 완전 꿀맛일 거예요

translation.en: Can I help get that lure out your face?
The one stuck in your face.
Yeah, nobody's come to clean it yet.
translation.ko: 응, 아직 청소하는 사람이 안 와서

translation.en: You're the lady who doesn't know who she is, right?
Do you have anything I could dry my hair with?
translation.ko: 머리 말릴 만한 거 좀 있어?

translation.en: -[Avy] Of course. In my room. -Thank you.
So, what are we supposed to call you?
Good question. I don't know. Do you have any names you like?
translation.ko: 그러게, 나도 모르겠네 특별히 좋아하는 이름 있니?

translation.en: You can have one of theirs.
That's Frankie, that's Wallace, that's Potter, and that's Sarah.
She died almost two years ago.
Well, I don't even know who I am. Nothing's weirder than that.
translation.ko: 난 내가 누군지도 모르잖아 그거보다 이상한 게 있을까?

translation.en: Sometimes I talk to her picture.
I don't think that's weird at all. I think that's beautiful.
translation.ko: 하나도 안 이상해 오히려 사랑이 느껴지는걸?

translation.en: -We met on the sleigh ride. -You were unconscious the whole time.
You've already met my dad. This is my grandma.
translation.ko: 아빠는 벌써 만났죠? 여기는 우리 할머니예요

translation.en: Well, Sarah, we just ran out of pumpkin pancakes,
but if you'd like, I can make you some eggs.
Oh, please, I'm perfectly capable of making my own breakfast.
translation.ko: 아침은 직접 만들어 먹을 수 있어요

translation.en: Yeah. No, you just gotta… You gotta push it in and then twist it.
translation.ko: 이걸 먼저 내린 뒤에 돌리면 돼요

translation.en: Well, you showed that egg who's boss.
You know what? Um… Why don't you sit over there,
translation.ko: 있잖아요 저쪽에 앉아 있는 건 어때요?

translation.en: and I will take care of all of this.

translation.ko: - 베이컨 먹을래요? - 난 베이컨 안 먹어

translation.en: Then how do you know you don't do it? [chuckles]
[Sierra] What are these muffins? I don't think she's from around here, dear.
translation.ko: - 이 머핀은 무슨 맛이야? - 여기 사람은 아닌 것 같은데

translation.en: -[Sierra] What's your favorite one? -Something about her…
translation.ko: - 넌 뭘 가장 좋아해? - 왜 그런지 모르겠는데

translation.en: I know-- I feel like I've met her before.
translation.ko: 전에 만난 적이 있는 거 같아요

translation.en: [sighs] Well, she said she didn't want to be disturbed.
But that was almost 24 hours ago.
This is hotel security. May I come in? Hello?
But she didn't sleep here last night.
translation.ko: 아예 방에 안 들어온 거 같은데요?

translation.en: Are you sure? Maybe she made the bed?
translation.ko: 확실해요? 직접 침구를 정리한 건 아닐까요?

translation.en: [scoffs] Miss Belmont make the bed? Not in this lifetime.
translation.ko: 직접 침구를 정리했다고요? 해가 서쪽에서 뜨는 게 빨라요

translation.en: "Sierra, can't wait to take you away."
Sounds like they planned to go off someplace together.
Thought I'd let you sleep in. You looked all cozy.

translation.ko: 로드킬당한 동물 시체처럼 소생 불가 상태예요

translation.en: We'll leave a note, head out on foot.
It's just a couple days' hike through the pass to get to the road.
translation.ko: 숲속을 이틀 정도만 걸으면 도로가 나올 거예요

translation.en: Hey, how about I whip us up some fried fish for breakfast? Sound good?
translation.ko: 아침 식사로 생선 튀김 어때요? 맛있겠죠?

translation.en: Oh, I don't eat fish. They are exotic pets in my saltwater aquarium
translation.ko: 전 생선 안 먹어요 해수 어항에 애완 물고기를 길러요

translation.en: -What am I supposed to do with this? -Hurl it at a squirrel?
-You're kidding? -They're going to an Airbnb instead.
-Well, how do we compete with that? -It's all going to work out.
translation.ko: - 도무지 상대가 안 된다니까요 - 어떻게든 풀릴 거야

translation.en: Well, I don't know how. Look at this. We can't even afford a housekeeper.
translation.ko: 방법이 안 보이잖아요 청소부도 못 쓰는 상황인데요

translation.en: I was just wondering, any calls regarding me?
translation.ko: 혹시 저를 찾는 전화 안 왔나요?

translation.en: I mean, surely someone is out there looking for me.
translation.ko: 분명 누군가 나를 찾고 있을 텐데

translation.en: You haven't been able to remember anything?
No, but the doctor did say that if I did normal things,
But I wonder what she meant by "normal things."
translation.ko: 하지만 일상생활이 어떤 걸 의미하는지 모르겠네요

translation.en: Have you ever actually made a bed, dear?
Why don't you try something else?
I'm telling you, man, take the gondola up the hill, man…
translation.ko: 곤돌라를 타고 올라갈 수 있으면 대박이라니까

translation.en: Do I just put these here?
[Ralph grunts] Nope. Stick with me, buddy.
I don't think I can make it!
Hey, don't you worry about me. I got big feet.
translation.ko: 내 걱정은 마요, 난 발이 크거든요

translation.en: Hey there. Are you okay? -[Avy] It's stuck. -Oh.
You just have to take your time.
translation.ko: 그럴 땐 시간을 충분히 들여야 해

translation.en: You know, my mom always said,
translation.ko: 우리 엄마가 늘 이런 말을 했어

translation.en: "The worst tangles will sort themselves out…"
[Sierra's mom] …if you just give them a little help.
-Oh. -It wasn't me, Dad. [Jake] Look at this mess!
translation.ko: - 제가 그런 거 아니에요 - 완전 난장판이 됐잖아

translation.en: Great. This is the last thing I need right now.
translation.ko: 안 그래도 힘든데 이런 사고까지 치면 어떡해요?

translation.en: but I have no idea who I am.
I can tell you I'm pretty much a useless human.
You'd think I'd have some sort of skill, wouldn't you?
translation.ko: 할 줄 아는 게 하나도 없는 거 있지?

translation.en: [sighs] Now, let's see if I can manage to fetch some wood.
translation.ko: 장작이라도 제대로 가져올 수 있는지 보자

translation.en: I didn't mean what I said earlier. It was…
translation.ko: 내가 아까 한 말 진심이 아니에요 그땐 그냥…

translation.en: [sighs] It's been almost two days, and what? No one's found me yet?
translation.ko: 이틀이나 지났는데 아무도 나를 안 찾아왔잖아요

translation.en: Hey, come on. Don't say that.
I… I bet you got family and friends who are worried sick about you.
translation.ko: 친구, 가족들이 엄청 걱정하고 있을 거예요

translation.en: I mean, they're probably out there looking for you right now.
translation.ko: 지금 다들 당신을 찾고 있을 거라고요

translation.en: You know what? Why don't we go to the Christmas Market downtown?
Okay, it's a big street fair, a lot of people there.
translation.ko: 큰 행사라 사람도 많이 올 거예요

translation.en: You know, maybe somebody will recognize you. I don't wanna be any more trouble.
translation.ko: - 누가 알아볼지도 모르잖아요 - 더는 귀찮게 하고 싶지 않아요

translation.en: No, it's… it's really no trouble.
Nah, that's… You can keep it.
Any of this ring a bell?
No, nothing. I don't think I've ever been here in my life.
translation.ko: 전혀요, 살면서 처음 온 거 같아요

translation.en: [Avy] Come on! You guys are too slow!
Avy gets pretty excited about Christmas.
Yeah, Avy told me about her.
It's been a rough couple of years.
I mean, I didn't even think we were gonna stay here after.
translation.ko: 아내가 떠난 후엔 우리도 이곳을 뜰 줄 알았죠

translation.en: I don't know, like, maybe back to the city?
translation.ko: 글쎄요 도시 생활로 돌아갈 수도 있고요

translation.en: I used to have a, uh… ski travel business.
But the North Star's been in Carla's family for three generations.
translation.ko: 칼라 가족은 노스 스타를 3대째 운영 중이었어요

translation.en: Her father gave it to us as a wedding gift,
and I kind of just… fell in love with the place.
translation.ko: 장인어른이 결혼 선물로 저희에게 주셨는데 단번에 사랑에 빠져 버렸죠

translation.en: -I don't want to have to sell it, but… -But?
You know, people, they… they like the new resorts,
the flashy stuff, all the bells and whistles.
But I still think there's something really special about the simple things.
translation.ko: 하지만 난 소박한 물건도 특별할 수 있다고 생각해요
여행자들에게 또 다른 집이 되어주는 거예요

translation.en: You have very good taste in sleighs, young lady.
This one's a beauty, all handmade.
Um… But I am afraid it is out of our league.
Well, I'm here watching this stall for a friend.
translation.ko: 친구 대신에 제가 가판대를 보는 중이니

translation.en: So, if you see anything else that you'd like, well… Oh!
translation.ko: 달리 마음에 드는 물건이 있으면 알려 주세요

translation.en: You know what? We'll take it.
Oh, come on. It's an early Christmas gift.
Come on. We don't wanna miss the tree-lighting. Let's go!
translation.ko: - 트리에 조명 켜질 시간이야 - 빨리 가요!

translation.en: Please welcome the mayor of Summit Springs.
translation.ko: 서밋 스프링스의 시장님입니다 박수로 맞아 주세요

translation.en: Welcome, everyone, to our annual Christmas tree-lighting ceremony.
translation.ko: 크리스마스트리 점등식에 오신 여러분을 모두 환영합니다

translation.en: You know, this is such a special event,
and just between you and me,
I think it's my favorite reason to be mayor of Summit Springs.
translation.ko: 저는 이 점등식 때문에 시장직을 유지하고 있어요

translation.en: Ah! But you didn't come here to listen to me yakking, right?
translation.ko: 다들 제 얘기를 듣자고 오신 건 아닐 거예요

translation.en: You came in to see some lights. So, hey, without further ado…
translation.ko: 점등식을 보려고 오신 거죠 그럼 지체할 거 없이 시작하죠

translation.en: Why don't you come on up here, sweetie, and help me pull this switch?
translation.ko: 아가, 단상에 올라와서 스위치 켜는 것 좀 도와줄래?

translation.en: When we count down, I want you to push that little candy cane, okay?
translation.ko: 숫자를 세면 저 사탕 막대를 미는 거야

translation.en: Come on, I can't hear you.
Who told you that? Come on, it's Christmas.
You know, um, when you first saw that snow globe,
you had this look in your eyes like you had seen it before.
translation.ko: 전에도 본 적이 있는 듯한 표정이던데요?

translation.en: Yeah, I suddenly had this memory of being a little girl,
translation.ko: 맞아요, 어릴 적 기억이 갑자기 떠올랐는데

translation.en: and this beautiful woman gave me something like that.
translation.ko: 어떤 예쁜 여자가 이런 걸 나한테 줬어요

translation.en: And I think it might have been my mother.
translation.ko: 그 여자가 우리 엄마인 거 같아요

translation.en: Well, I mean, at least you remembered something. That's a start.
translation.ko: 그래도 뭔가 기억이 난 거잖아요 그렇게 시작하는 거죠

translation.en: Well, it's been a long night.
Yeah, I'm pretty beat too, so…
I just wanted to tell you
I don't think I've ever met anyone like you before
translation.ko: 당신 같은 사람은 정말 처음 만나 본 거 같아요

translation.en: because if I had, I would definitely remember it.
translation.ko: 이전에도 만났다면 기억 못 할 리가 없으니까요

translation.en: It's just me, dear. I come to make the…
The trick is, it's all in the wrists.
Okay, that's okay. One more. Do it again. Again.
translation.ko: 그래도 잘했어요 한 번 더 해 보죠, 다시!

translation.en: -Okay. You know, just use both hands. -Okay.
[Jake] There you go, hand-eye coordination. All right!
translation.ko: 잘 보고 손목을 활용하니까 되죠? 잘했어요!

translation.en: You have to make sure you use lots of icing to keep it in place.
translation.ko: 잘 붙어 있게 하려면 아이싱을 많이 발라야 해요

translation.en: All right, guys, remember, inside edge, okay?
translation.ko: 스키 안쪽에 힘주는 거 잊지 말아요

translation.en: Last one down buys pizza. Ready?
-[whooping] Looking great, everyone! -Are you ready to ski?
I don't know if I remember how.
It's gonna be easy. Follow the kids, take it slow, just like I said.
translation.ko: 쉬워요, 그냥 애들 따라가요 내가 말한 대로 천천히 가면 돼요

translation.en: -Now, let's see what you got. Let's go! -[exhales]
All right, nice. Here you go. That's the bill.
Thanks for staying at the North Star. And Merry Christmas.
translation.ko: 노스 스타를 찾아 주셔서 감사해요 메리 크리스마스

translation.en: [gasps] Oh, I'm sorry, dear. I didn't see you there.
I'm fine. Just a little blue, I guess.
Probably shouldn't have started looking through this in the first place.
translation.ko: 애초에 이걸 열어 보는 게 아닌데

translation.en: I call it our memory book.
Christmas cards, wedding programs, notes from guests.
translation.ko: 크리스마스카드, 결혼식 사진 하객들이 쓴 편지 등이 들어 있죠

translation.en: Oh, your daughter. She's really beautiful.
I like to remind myself every now and then
translation.ko: 가끔씩 우리 가족의 리조트가 다른 사람들에게도

translation.en: how our little family lodge has touched other people's lives.
translation.ko: 의미 있는 장소란 걸 스스로에게 상기시키곤 해요

translation.en: [sighs] …since we might not be here much longer.
translation.ko: 오래 머물지 못할 거 같아서 더 그런 생각을 하게 되네요

translation.en: I thought Jake didn't want to sell. He might not have a choice.
translation.ko: - 제이크는 팔 생각이 없던데요? - 어쩔 수 없을 거예요

translation.en: this might be our last Christmas at North Star Lodge.
translation.ko: 이번이 노스 스타에서 보내는 마지막 크리스마스가 될 거예요

translation.en: Anyway, that's nothing for you to worry about.
I've got to pick up, Avy.
Can you put that back in Jake's desk when you're done?
translation.ko: 앨범 다 보고 나서 제이크 책상 서랍에 둘래요?

translation.en: -Hey, what's going on? -Oh, hi. The drawer was stuck.
translation.ko: - 뭐해요? - 아, 책상 서랍이 안 열려서요

translation.en: Yeah, I've been meaning to fix that.
This is really beautiful. -Why don't you put it on the tree? -Um…
translation.ko: 이거 정말 예쁘네요 왜 트리에 걸어 두지 않았죠?

translation.en: I'm not ready to put it up.
Oh, I'm sorry. It's really none of my business.
No, I'm… I'm sorry. I just… It's…
We… We… Um, Carla and I bought it together, and…
I don't… I don't wanna get rid of it,
but I can't bring myself to put it on the tree. So, I…
You know what? I gotta go 'cause I'm gonna be late for the toy drive.
translation.ko: 이만 가 봐야겠네요 장난감 자선 행사에 늦겠어요

translation.en: Yeah. You know, Summit Springs has one every year
translation.ko: 네, 서밋 스프링스에서 매년 하는 행사인데

translation.en: for families who are having a rough go of it, so…
Yeah, well, you know, every kid deserves something for Christmas.
translation.ko: 크리스마스엔 모든 아이들이 선물을 받을 자격이 있으니까요

translation.en: -How's it going? -I just finished my first one.
translation.ko: - 잘하고 있어요? - 첫 번째 포장 끝났어요

translation.en: Okay. Um, pretty good. I'll show you a trick.
You gotta use as little paper as possible.
Wrapping technique shouldn't require more than three pieces of tape.
translation.ko: 딱 세 군데에만 테이프를 붙이는 거예요

translation.en: So you do it like this,
Louise, you know I would never forget my Christmas girlfriend.
translation.ko: 루이스, 내가 크리스마스 여친을 잊어버릴 리 없잖아요

translation.en: -It looks like you already have. -This is Sarah.
translation.ko: - 여친은 따로 있는 거 같은데요? - 여긴 세라예요

translation.en: -Nice to meet you. -Nice to meet you.
[man] Jake! We need help sorting things out! All right. Um, I'll be right back.
translation.ko: - 제이크, 물건 분류 좀 도와줘요! - 금방 올 테니까

translation.en: You two… don't talk about me while I'm gone.
translation.ko: 나 없다고 내 얘기 하지 말아요

translation.en: -[both chuckle] -[woman] Hi. Can we drop our toys here?
-Merry Christmas. Thank you so much. -There you go.
[Louise] I don't know what we'd do without Jake Russell.
translation.ko: 제이크 러셀이 없으면 동네가 안 돌아갈 거예요

translation.en: I can't even count how many charities he's helped out in town.
translation.ko: 얼마나 많은 자선 단체를 도왔는지 셀 수도 없어요

translation.en: I just wish that there was some way that Summit Springs could show him how much he means to us.
translation.ko: 서밋 스프링스 사람들이 어떻게든 보답할 수 있으면 좋을 텐데요

translation.en: -[woman] Great job on this wrapping. -[Jake] I don't know if I did wrap…
translation.ko: - 포장 잘했네요 - 내가 포장한 거 맞아요?

translation.en: Again, thank you so much for helping out tonight.
Oh, thank you for inviting me. Everyone was so nice.
translation.ko: 데려가 줘서 고마워요 덕분에 좋은 분들 많이 만났어요

translation.en: think you're going to remember any of this when you get your memory back?
We are standing under the mistletoe.
You know, maybe we shouldn't do this.
I mean, what if you're with somebody.
translation.ko: 당신 곁에 다른 사람이 있으면 어떡해요

translation.en: I have an idea on how we can help the North Star.
translation.ko: 노스 스타를 되살릴 좋은 아이디어가 생각났어요

translation.en: I've got the contacts for almost every guest we've had

translation.ko: 노스 스타 모금 행사를 열 거야

translation.en: Cool. Have you talked to dad about it?
There's no way I'm having a fundraiser to save the lodge.
translation.ko: 리조트 살린다고 모금 행사를 열 수는 없어요

translation.en: No. It won't be a fundraiser.
It'll be like a Christmas flashback party.
And we'll invite all the guests you've had over the years
translation.ko: 그동안 여기에 묵은 손님들을 전부 초대해서

translation.en: to celebrate their favorite North Star memories.
translation.ko: 노스 스타에서의 소중한 추억을 기념하는 거죠

translation.en: And, okay, yes, we'll ask for a donation, but what's the big deal?
translation.ko: 물론 모금은 하겠지만 그게 뭐 대수예요?

translation.en: The big deal is I live in Summit Springs, okay?
I don't want people looking at me differently. I don't want them thinking I need a handout.
translation.ko: 사람들이 나를 다르게 보거나 불쌍하게 생각하는 건 싫어요

translation.en: But you don't want to lose the North Star either, do you?
Look, I'm tired of struggling with this place.
I'm tired of everything always breaking down.
I'm tired of wondering how we'll make it to the end of the month.
translation.ko: 월말까지 또 어떻게 버티나 고민하는 것도 싫어요

translation.en: Jake, you can't turn your back on this lodge.
-Think about all the memories you've made. -I do. I do. All the time.
translation.ko: - 그간의 추억을 생각해 봐요 - 생각해요, 항상요

translation.en: And to be honest, you know, I'd be happy to let some of them go.
translation.ko: 솔직히 그중 일부는 이제 놔줄 때도 된 거 같아요

translation.en: And what do you know about memories? You can't even remember your name.
translation.ko: 당신이 추억에 대해 뭘 알아요? 자기 이름도 기억 못 하면서

translation.en: Look, ever since you got here, you…
Well, you've made me feel things…
Things that I didn't ever think I was ever going to feel again.
translation.ko: 다시는 느끼지 못할 거라 생각했던 감정이에요

translation.en: And, yes, you're right. This place does have a lot of memories for me.
translation.ko: 맞아요, 난 이곳에 추억이 참 많아요

translation.en: I guess I'm just, you know, afraid of making
translation.ko: 아마도 나는 새로운 추억을 만드는 게
당신 같은 사람과 함께한다고 해도 말이죠

translation.en: I just… I don't really know what I'm doing anymore.
translation.ko: 제가 지금 뭘 하고 있는 건지 정말 모르겠어요

translation.en: You've been doing everything you can to hold this family together.
translation.ko: 자네가 가족을 위해 최선을 다한 거 알아

translation.en: But we are all right now.
Sarah. We're making snowflakes. Want to come help me?
translation.ko: 세라, 눈송이 만드는 중인데 같이 할래요?

translation.en: I'm sorry, I can't right now, Avy, but maybe later.
translation.ko: 미안한데, 지금은 곤란해 이따가 같이 하자

translation.en: Alejandra, can I talk to you for a second?
translation.ko: 알레한드라 잠깐 얘기 좀 할 수 있을까요?

translation.en: [sighs] I think it's time for me to leave.
translation.ko: 이제 떠날 때가 된 거 같아요

translation.en: Don't say that. You know you're welcome to stay as long as it takes.
translation.ko: 그런 말 마요 얼마든지 있어도 괜찮아요

translation.en: Yes, thank you, but I think it's just best for everyone I just go.
translation.ko: 감사해요, 하지만 제가 떠나는 게 모두에게 좋을 거 같아요

translation.en: But I thought you were gonna stay with us for Christmas.
And I would love that, but there's just been a change of plans.
translation.ko: 나도 그러고 싶은데 계획이 틀어져 버렸네

translation.en: Something I've been saving for the right moment.
But we need Sarah to help us put it up.
I know, but I don't wanna do this without you.
translation.ko: 알아요, 그래도 이건 당신과 같이 하고 싶어요

translation.en: You know what this place needs right now?
translation.ko: 아직 한 가지가 부족해 뭔지 알아?

translation.en: -[Sierra and Alejandra laughing] -All right, let's do it! Let's go!
All right, a little bit closer together.
On the count of three, "Merry Christmas."
translation.ko: 셋을 세면 메리 크리스마스를 외치는 거예요

translation.en: All right, you guys enjoy the slopes.
Christmas Eve, come to North Star.
Here you go. Merry Christmas. Christmas party at the North Star.
translation.ko: 안녕하세요, 노스 스타에서 크리스마스 파티가 열려요

translation.en: -There's a party at the North Star. -Thank you!
It's December 24th. I know you probably have plans, but we'll be there.
These are the best canned beans
Ralph! Have you considered starting a survival blog?
translation.ko: 랄프! 생존 기술을 알려주는 블로그를 하는 건 어때요?

translation.en: I'm sure I could get you sponsored.
translation.ko: 내가 스폰서도 구해 줄 수 있는데

translation.en: [chuckles] Well, thank you, Tad. Wouldn't that be something?
Yeah, they got a little kick. It can sneak up on you.
Hi! I just got to the hotel. So, give me a call when you get this.
translation.ko: 지금 호텔에 막 왔어 메시지 들으면 전화해

translation.en: Mr. Belmont. [chuckling nervously] Hello, you're back.
Hi. I need to talk to Sierra, but she's not answering her phone.
translation.ko: 네, 시에라와 할 얘기가 있는데 전화를 안 받네요

translation.en: -Have her meet me in my office. -I'm sorry, Mr. Belmont.
I don't know where she is.
I asked you to take care of her while she was here.
translation.ko: 여기에 묵는 동안 잘 돌보라고 당부했잖아요

translation.en: Well, yes, but she and Mr. Fairchild went skiing the other day,
translation.ko: 네, 따님과 남자친구분이 며칠 전에 스키를 타러 가셨는데

translation.en: and that's the last time that I saw her. So…
"The other day"? Are you telling me you haven't seen my daughter in four days?
Well, no, but I just thought she and Mr. Fairchild wanted a little private time together.
translation.ko: 따님께서 남자친구분과 시간을 보내고 싶으신 줄 알았어요

translation.en: And she told me not to bother her. Then… Well, I…
translation.ko: 방해하지 말라고 하셨거든요 그러고 나서 제가…
- 나도 같이 했잖아요 - 저희가 이걸 찾았어요

translation.en: My daughter never goes anywhere without her luggage.
translation.ko: 우리 딸은 자기 짐 없이는 절대 어디 안 가요

translation.en: You, have the security team check the grounds.
Search every inch of the resort.
-I'm on it. -And you, call the Sheriff's Office.
You tell them that I want them to find my daughter.
We're gonna need a search party. Got some knuckleheads lost in the pass.
translation.ko: 수색대가 필요해요 산속으로 걸어간 얼간이가 있어요

translation.en: [man] Copy that. Do we have any idea who it is?
I'm just trying to find something to wear.
Well, actually, that's why I'm here.
I took the liberty of picking up a little something for you to wear tonight.
translation.ko: 오늘 밤에 입을 옷을 내가 한번 골라 봤거든요

translation.en: Oh my gosh. Thank you so much. You didn't have to.
translation.ko: 어머나, 정말 감사해요 이러지 않으셔도 되는데

translation.en: He hasn't done that in a long time.
Oh! I brought you a pair of shoes too.
Ralph, I'm afraid we're gonna have to book you this time.
What? This is an outrage! That man is a hero.
translation.ko: 뭐라고요? 말도 안 돼! 영웅한테 이래도 돼요?

translation.en: -He was poaching on government land. -He saved my life.
translation.ko: - 정부 땅에서 밀렵을 했잖아요 - 내 생명의 은인이라고요

translation.en: You'll have to arrest me too.
-Oh, it's a long and terrifying tale. -Where's my daughter?
translation.ko: - 끔찍한 일이 있었어요 - 내 딸은 어딨어?

translation.en: I don't know. I expect at the hotel?
No, she's not at the hotel. And I was told she's supposed to be with you.
translation.ko: 호텔에 없어 자네랑 같이 있을 거라던데?

translation.en: Well, she was, but then we got separated when we were up on the mountain.
translation.ko: 같이 있긴 했는데 산에 올라갔다가 헤어졌어요

translation.en: -Looks like I'll be calling you "Dad." -Hey, congratulations.
-Thank you, friend. -I know where she is. Come on.
You know that that says, "Do not open until Christmas."
translation.ko: '크리스마스 때까지 열지 마시오' 메모 쓰여 있는 거 보이지?

translation.en: Jake, do you think we have enough food? I don't want to run out.
translation.ko: 제이크, 음식이 충분할까? 모자라면 안 되는데

translation.en: I don't think it's gonna be a problem. It's Christmas Eve.
People got things to do. It's a very last-minute party, so…
translation.ko: 다들 계획이 있을 텐데 급하게 연 파티에 오겠어요?

translation.en: It's late, and no one's here yet.
Don't give up, Jake. You just need a little bit of faith.
translation.ko: 포기하지 마, 제이크 믿음을 좀 가져 봐

translation.en: Thank you. Alejandra bought it for me.
Avy, sweetheart, why don't you come help me make some more appetizers.
-But Dad said we don't need any more. -Avy.
translation.ko: - 아빠가 더 만들 필요 없대요 - 애비

translation.en: Yeah. Moved out a bunch of the tables,
put in a little dance floor, just in case.
Maybe we should test it out?
I'm not sure if I can dance, but…
I have a really good feeling about tonight.
translation.ko: 오늘 밤 좋은 일이 있을 거 같아요

translation.en: Is it weird if I kind of hope nobody shows up?
translation.ko: 차라리 아무도 안 왔으면 좋겠어요 이상하죠?

translation.en: I got stuck behind Ed Hudson's snow plow all the way up.
translation.ko: 오는 길에 계속 제설 트럭이 길을 막아서요

translation.en: Well, thank you. Thank you so much for coming.
Yeah, well, it's not just me.
-[Jake] Get some food, refreshments. -[man 3] Thank you.
-Everybody seems to be having a good time. -Yes. Now here's your chance. Go.
translation.ko: - 다들 즐기고 있네요 - 네, 지금이 연설하기에 딱이에요

translation.en: No, no. I'm not gonna get up there. I wouldn't know what to say.
translation.ko: 어떻게 그래요 무슨 말을 해야 할지도 모르는데요

translation.en: Don't worry, you're gonna be great.
Everyone is gonna love you. They're having so much fun.
translation.ko: 다들 따뜻하게 맞아 줄 거예요 얼마나 즐거워하는지 봐요

translation.en: Excuse me. Uh… Excuse me, everybody.
Um, I just want to say,
if you see a gingerbread house, please don't take a bite.
No, I kid. Um, anyway, hello, everybody.
My name is Jake. I'm the owner of the--
I think everyone knows who you are, Jake.
translation.ko: 제이크를 모르는 사람은 없을 거 같은데요

translation.en: Good point. Um… Okay, well, anyway.
translation.ko: 맞는 말이네요 우선 감사 인사부터 할게요

translation.en: Thank you all, uh, for being here tonight.
translation.ko: 오늘 밤 저희 리조트를 찾아 주셔서 감사해요

translation.en: Well, the thing is, the North Star, uh… [clicks tongue]
Well, there is this situation, and, uh…
You know, I remember the first time our family came to the North Star Lodge.
translation.ko: 우리 가족이 처음 노스 스타에 왔을 때가 기억나요

translation.en: You took my son under your wing and taught him to ski.
translation.ko: 제이크가 우리 아들한테 스키 타는 법을 알려줬죠

translation.en: And I will admit, he wasn't a quick study.
translation.ko: 내 아들이지만 영 감을 못 잡더라고요

translation.en: No. He was… He was not. [laughs]
Anyway, I, uh, figured I owe you this much for ski lessons.
translation.ko: 그때 우리 아들 스키 가르쳐 준 강습비예요

translation.en: When we got married, we could not afford a honeymoon.
translation.ko: 결혼식 직후 신혼여행 갈 돈이 없었어요

translation.en: Jake, you gave us the biggest suite in the place for the weekend,
translation.ko: 근데 제이크가 가장 큰 스위트룸에 샴페인까지 내주면서

translation.en: champagne and everything, and you wouldn't take a dime for it, so…
translation.ko: 신혼 분위기를 만끽하게 해줬어요 그러고는 돈도 거절했죠

translation.en: We want to give you… this.
Thank you for this. Thank you so much.
I think this is good a time as any to make a little announcement of my own.
translation.ko: 좋은 소식을 발표하기에 딱 좋은 타이밍인 듯하네요

translation.en: Summit Springs town council has put forth a proposal
translation.ko: 서밋 스프링스 시의회에서 노스 스타 리조트를

translation.en: to have the North Star Lodge declared a historic site.
translation.ko: 역사적 보존 가치가 있는 건물로 지정하도록 제안했어요

translation.en: Now that should help a bit with funds and grants for renovations and so forth.
translation.ko: 이제 보조금과 지원금이 나오니까 관리 비용이 조금은 충당될 거예요

translation.en: Well, here's for that time you towed my car out of that snowbank.
translation.ko: 그때 눈더미에서 내 차 견인해 준 비용이에요

translation.en: Oh my gosh. I can't believe you remembered that. [laughs]
You're a good man, Jake. Thank you so much, wow.
translation.ko: - 제이크는 정말 좋은 사람이에요 - 정말 감사해요

translation.en: Guys, thank you so much. Merry Christmas.

translation.ko: - 베푼 만큼 받아도 돼요 - 메리 크리스마스

translation.en: -[Avy] Thank you. -[woman] We love the North Star.
We're happy to do something for you for a change.
translation.ko: 이렇게라도 보답할 수 있어서 정말 기뻐요

translation.en: I really don't know what to say. Gosh.
It's all a little overwhelming for me right now. Um…
I would like to say one thing, though. Um…
translation.ko: 그래도 한 가지는 꼭 말하고 싶어요

translation.en: None of this here tonight would be possible
translation.ko: 이분 덕분에 오늘 밤 파티를 열 수 있었어요

translation.en: if it weren't for a very special guest
that we have staying here at the lodge.
She's changed the way I see, uh…
not the least of which is myself.
So, can we just, uh… Can we get her up here? Uh…
Will you come up here for a second?
Everybody, would you please give a big thank you to--
I found you at last! Darling!
There you go. Reunited for Christmas.
-[woman] What did he say? -[man] His daughter?
translation.ko: - 뭐라고 한 거야? - 대박, 저 사람 딸이라고?

translation.en: Well, of course it's your name.
Hello? It's me Tad Fairchild, your fiancé.
And I've met you before. Last week.
I didn't know who you were.
-I think I told you that, right? -Mm-hmm.
translation.ko: 내가 이 말 한 적 있죠?

translation.en: I was skiing, and I… and I fell, and I hit a tree.
And then I ended up here,
I have no idea what's transpired here,
but clearly, you've taken very good care of my daughter.
translation.ko: 내 딸을 잘 돌봐준 거 같네요

translation.en: And I appreciate that a great deal.
Let's get you back to the hotel, okay, sweetie?
Nice, hot bath, maybe some champagne to help clear your head.
translation.ko: 온수 욕조에서 샴페인 한잔하면 생각이 정리될 거야

translation.en: [Sierra] Yeah, the hotel. I should get back…
I don't want you to go.
But I have to go home.
I don't even know what to say.
Her name is Sierra, honey. She's going home.
translation.ko: 저 언니 이름은 시에라야 집에 돌아가는 거야

translation.en: I just wanted to tell you, I don't think I've ever met anyone like you before.
translation.ko: 당신 같은 사람은 정말 처음 만나 본 거 같아요

translation.en: I know what I said, but I don't wanna do this without you.
translation.ko: 알아요, 그래도 이건 당신과 같이 하고 싶어요

translation.en: Miss Belmont? Are you up yet?
Mr. Fairchild just wanted me to remind you
that he's arranged a press conference in two hours.
translation.ko: 두 시간 후에 기자 회견을 할 예정이라네요

translation.en: There's been quite a-- Ooh! Sparkly.
Uh, there's been quite a bit of media attention for your ordeal.
translation.ko: 벨몬트 양 사건과 관련해서 언론의 관심이 상당해요

translation.en: Miss Belmont, what are you doing?
Oh, I'm just helping the housekeepers out a bit.
I found this gorgeous piece, just flown in from Milan.
I think I'm gonna go simple today.
Actually, I'm in the mood for something different this morning.
Hope her experience at that dreadful hostel hasn't traumatized her.
But, darling, the press conference is in 30 minutes.
translation.ko: 30분 후에 기자 회견 있는 거 알지?

translation.en: I'm gonna try them on right now.
Thank you so much for my awesome helmet!
All right. I'm just gonna clean up a little bit. Me too.
translation.ko: - 일단 정리 좀 할까? - 같이 해

translation.en: People were very generous last night.
I don't think it's gonna make a difference if we don't get any reservations.
translation.ko: 하지만 예약이 늘지 않으면 상황은 달라지지 않을 거예요

translation.en: And we're gonna need a Christmas miracle.
-[reporter] This breaking news is just in. -Dad!

translation.ko: 호텔계 거물 보러가드 벨몬트 씨의 상속녀죠

translation.en: daughter of hotel magnate Beauregard Belmont…
Let's go live now to the press conference.
Miss Belmont. Would you tell us in your own words what happened?
translation.ko: 벨몬트 양, 무슨 일이 있었나요? 그동안 어디 계셨던 거죠?

translation.en: I would like to thank Jake Russell and his family at the North Star Lodge.
translation.ko: 노스 스타 리조트의 제이크 러셀과 가족들에게 감사 인사를 전합니다

translation.en: They took very good care of me at their charming ski resort.
translation.ko: 근사한 스키 리조트를 운영 중인데 저를 잘 돌봐주셨어요

translation.en: Ms. Belmont, what are your plans for the future?
Let me answer that by showing you… this.
-Just one more question. -Does this mean you're eloping?
translation.ko: - 하나만 더 묻겠습니다 - 사랑의 도피를 하신 건가요?

translation.en: [Tad] Isn't it beautiful? [reporter] Who designed the ring?
Mr. Fairchild has asked me to marry him.
-But I-- -You must be excited, Mr. Belmont.
Excited doesn't come close to describing how I feel.
We're keeping that secret. Actually, we're catching a plane in a couple of hours
translation.ko: 그건 비밀로 하려고요 두 시간 후에 비행기를 타고

translation.en: Guess my Christmas wish didn't come true after all.
When Grandma and I were at The Wishing Tree,
I didn't make a wish for myself.
I made it for you, Dad.
You gave your wish up for me?
I wished for you to find someone to love.
You take such good care of all of us.
I just wanted you to have someone take care of you too.
translation.ko: 아빠를 챙겨줄 사람이 나타나면 좋겠다고 생각했어요

translation.en: Avy, honey, um… I just… It's just not that easy.
translation.ko: 우리 딸, 그건 쉬운 일이 아니야

translation.en: Sure, it is. You like her, don't you?
-Well, yeah, but it's not-- -Did you ever tell her?
Not in so many words, no.
I think you should tell her.
-Go get dressed. Go tell her. Let's go! -Okay, all right.
The roads are closed at this end of the valley.
-Did you and Grandma do this? -No. Where did it come from?
translation.ko: - 너랑 할머니랑 한 거야? - 아니요, 어떻게 온 거지?

translation.en: I don't know. I'll go get Balthazar. You coming?
translation.ko: 글쎄, 일단 발타자르를 데려올게 같이 갈 거야?

translation.en: A couple of hours from now, we'll be taking selfies on a beautiful beach.
translation.ko: 두 시간 후면 아름다운 해변에서 사진을 찍고 있겠지?

translation.en: You know what? You go on ahead.
-Um, I'll meet you at the car. -Don't be too long.
translation.ko: - 차로 갈게 - 오래 기다리게 하지 마

translation.en: -I won't. -Don't want to miss the flight.
translation.ko: - 잠깐이면 돼 - 비행기 놓치면 안 되잖아

translation.en: I'm really sorry I didn't get a chance to tell you
about me and Tad, the engagement.
You know, the most important thing to me is that you're happy.
Don't worry about the job. It'll be here when you get back.
translation.ko: 그건 걱정 마 네 자리는 아빠가 맡아 놓을 거야

translation.en: That's the thing. I don't want it to be.
translation.ko: 그래서 말인데 저 부사장 하기 싫어요

translation.en: Vice President of Atmosphere? You just did that to take care of me.
translation.ko: 분위기 담당 부사장이라뇨 저 때문에 일부러 만든 거잖아요

translation.en: [sighs] Well, maybe a little, but I--
And I love you for it, and I'll always be your daughter.
translation.ko: 그런 아빠라서 사랑하고 영원히 아빠 딸로 남을 거예요

translation.en: I just… I need to find my own way. I hope you're not angry.
translation.ko: 하지만 저만의 길을 찾아야 해요 화내지 않으시면 좋겠어요

translation.en: I don't think I've ever been more proud of you.
I told you I promised your mother that I'd take care of you.
translation.ko: 널 잘 돌보겠다고 엄마랑 약속했다고 했잖아

translation.en: Looks like you're starting to take care of yourself.
translation.ko: 스스로를 돌볼 줄 아는 사람이 되었네

translation.en: Your mother would be so proud of you.
-[man] …place on the news? -Yes, this is the place.
-[man] I need a reservation. -For how many?
-[phone rings] -Oh, may I place you on hold for a moment?
[woman] Is this the place where Sierra Belmont was?
Yes, this is the place where Sierra Belmont stayed.
-The phone is lighting up like Christmas. -[Jake] You're kidding.
Oh. Can I get you anything?
You're a great guy, but I'm just not ready for this yet.
translation.ko: 당신 좋은 사람인 건 알겠는데 난 아직 준비가 안 됐어

translation.en: I thought I was, but I'm not.
[chuckles] Are you breaking up with me?
I know you, Tad. You'll be okay by New Year's.
translation.ko: 내가 널 모르니? 새해 밝기 전에 괜찮아질 거야

translation.en: Do you mind if I post about this on my page?
Nothing like a breakup to really add to your numbers.
translation.ko: 팔로워 수 늘리는 데는 실연이 특효거든

translation.en: I am so sorry, Mr. Fairchild. [chuckles]
Oh! And at the holidays too. Oh.
What are you doing for New Year's?
All right. Are you okay to watch Balthazar?
translation.ko: 발타자르 잠깐 보고 있을 수 있어?

translation.en: Wait! Wait! Wait! Wait! Stop the car. Don't move.
Look, can you just give me… give me one second.
Look, okay, I… I know we barely know each other,
and you'll probably gonna think I'm crazy for saying this.
translation.ko: 그리고 내가 이렇게 말해서 미쳤다고 생각하겠지만

translation.en: But I… I can't let you leave without telling you I'm falling in love with you.
translation.ko: 당신이 떠나기 전에 사랑하게 됐다고 말하고 싶었어요

translation.en: Well, that's very flattering, but I have other plans.
translation.ko: 마음은 고맙지만 난 다른 계획이 있어서요

translation.en: I believe what you're looking for is in the back courtyard.
translation.ko: 그쪽이 찾는 사람은 뒷마당에 있을 거예요

translation.en: Uh, no, change of plans. I'm staying here
So, what are you doing here?
Uh… I… I just wanted to say thank you.
I just found out the North Star is sold out for the rest of the season.
translation.ko: 이번 시즌 남은 기간 동안 노스 스타 객실 예약이 꽉 찼대요

translation.en: Really? Hm. Sold out, huh? Sounds like you might need some help running the place.
Well, my dad did also mention investing in the North Star,
translation.ko: 아빠가 노스 스타에 투자할까 얘기도 하시던데

translation.en: but I didn't think you'd be interested.
I did say I would try to convince you over the holidays.
translation.ko: 아빠한테 연말 동안 설득해 보겠다고 말하긴 했어요

translation.en: That is, if you wouldn't mind spending them with me.
translation.ko: 나랑 함께 있는 게 싫지 않다면요

translation.en: But I bumped my head on the way over here,
and for the life of me, I can't remember what it is.
Yeah, I think I can help you out with that.
Oh, it's Tad, Daddy. And, uh… It wasn't meant to be. [chuckles]
-Happy you're here, Jake. -It's good to see you, Mr. Belmont.
translation.ko: - 잘 왔어요, 제이크 - 다시 보니 반갑네요

translation.en: -What a Christmas, guys. -Yeah, it's one I'll never forget.
translation.ko: - 이런 크리스마스도 있네요 - 평생 잊지 못할 거예요

translation.en: And I see you've met my daughter, Avy…
translation.ko: 벌써 만나신 듯하지만 제 딸 애비예요

translation.en: Tad, I told you a place in the lobby. Where are you?
I'm so sorry. I didn't see you there.
Come on! Moving skis. Okay, let's do it.
You've made a Christmas wish without me?
This is so beautiful. Why don't you put it on the tree?
Tad, it's not voice-activated! Get me off of this thing! You're ridiculous!
translation.ko: 타드, 음성 인식 안 된다니까! 나 내릴래, 이상한 짓 그만해!

translation.en: I'm not used to seeing women here at the lodge.
I think you just need to be more polite, darling.
Give me one more because I can't stop…
I can't stop laughing right now.
We're gonna get so many partiers.
-Do I have anything on my nose? -Yeah. [giggling]
[laughing] I don't know how that happened.
All you have to go is just go up there and show your heart--

translation.ko: 뭐라는 거야? 무슨 말을 하는 거지?

translation.en: Would you please tell that large, muscular man behind me
translation.ko: 저 뒤에 있는 근육맨한테 클로즈업 중이니까
시선 좀 뺏어가지 말라고 말해 줄래요?
